items.title: Taking Stock: Nifty closes above 25,000, Sensex rises 123 pts; oil & gas, power stocks gain, IT falls
items.description: More than 100 stocks touched their 52-week highs on the BSE, including Waaree Energies, Zydus Wellness, Indian Bank, Fortis Healthcare, Gujarat Mineral, among others.

items.title: Tata Investment Corp shares jump 3% as report says Tata Capital aiming to launch mega IPO in October
items.description: Tata Investment Corp share price: Tata Capital is preparing to launch its IPO in the first half of October after asking Reserve Bank of India for a short extension to the launch timetable, Bloomberg reported.

items.title: Live: Sensex flat on expiry day; Nifty extends gain for 7th day, reclaims 25,000 | Closing Bell
items.description: Sensex Ekes Slim Gains On Expiry Day. 7 Day Run For Nifty, Reclaims 25,000. PSU Banks Outperform Markets. Nifty Auto Index Slips For 4th Day. Nifty IT Index Snaps 2-day Gains. Broader Markets Underperform. Nifty 50 Gainers: Shriram Fin, Adani Ent, NTPC. Nifty 50 Losers: Infy, Bajaj Auto, Eicher Motors. Catch Lovisha Darad and Yatin Mota as they discuss the stocks on their radar.

items.title: Two Adani group stocks fall up to 1% amid large trade deals
items.description: Exchange data showed that more than 3.7 crore shares of Adani Power were traded in opening deals at an average price of Rs 608.35 per share

items.title: Tube Investments of India shares fall 0.65% amid volume surge
items.description: At 03:01 pm, Tube Investments of India Ltd was trading at Rs 3,214.00 amid volume surge.

items.title: Bharti Airtel shares gain 1.03%, stock among top gainers on Nifty 50
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 1,910.80, Bharti Airtel is currently among the top gainers on the Nifty 50 index.

items.title: Aurobindo Pharm among top gainers on Nifty Midcap 150; shares rise 5.57%
items.description: Aurobindo Pharm's shares have demonstrated significant gains, positioning it as a top performer within the Nifty Midcap 150 as of today's session.

items.title: Infosys share price falls 1.29%, hits intraday low of Rs 1,508
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 1,512.80, Infosys saw its stock price decline in Thursday's trading session.

items.title: PSU bank stocks gain for 2nd day on consolidation buzz; PNB, Canara Bank, others rise up to 2%
items.description: The Nifty PSU Bank index rose nearly 1 percent to 7,089, extending gains for the second consecutive session.

items.title: Buy Coal India; target of Rs 450: Motilal Oswal
items.description: Motilal Oswal is bullish on Coal India recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 450 in its research report dated September 10, 2025.

items.title: Buy CESC; target of Rs 195: Mirae Asset Sharekhan
items.description: Mirae Asset Sharekhan is bullish on CESC has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 195 in its research report dated September 10, 2025.

items.title: Avanti Feeds, Welspun Living, other shrimp & textile stocks drop up to 4% after sharp gains on India-US trade talks hopes
items.description: The stocks had seen significant surge on September 10 after US President Donald Trump said Washington and New Delhi will resume negotiations to resolve the ongoing trade frictions.

items.title: Indian Oil Corporation shares rise 2.04%
items.description: The stock is a constituent of the Nifty Next 50 index.

items.title: Dr Reddys Labs, Tech Mahindra, Infosys shares among top losers on Nifty 50
items.description: Shares of Dr Reddys Labs, Tech Mahindra, and Infosys were among the top losers on the Nifty 50 in Thursday's trading session.

items.title: Gujarat Fluoro shares fall 3.47%; stock among top losers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: Despite overall bullish sentiment indicated by a Moneycontrol analysis as of September 9, 2025, select stocks experienced declines, reflecting varying financial performances and corporate developments.

items.title: Eternal, Adani Ports stocks among top gainers on Nifty 50 in today's trading
items.description: Eternal, Adani Ports, Shriram Finance, NTPC and ONGC were identified as top gainers in today's session.

items.title: Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders shares rise 2.02% in morning trade
items.description: Shares of Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders were trading at Rs 2,811, up 2.02% in morning trade.

items.title: NHPC shares rise 2.04% in morning trade; stock among top gainers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 81.18, NHPC has shown a positive trend in today's session.

items.title: CG Power and Industrial Solutions shares rise 2.02%
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 784.50, CG Power and Industrial Solutions has seen a positive movement in today's session.

items.title: Infosys shares fall nearly 1% in morning trade; over 18.7 lakh shares traded
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 1,518, Infosys has seen a decline of 0.95% from the previous close.

items.title: NLC India, Cochin Shipyard stocks among top gainers on Nifty Midcap 150 in today's trading
items.description: NLC India, Cochin Shipyard, GE Vernova TD, Hitachi Energy and Hind Zinc were among the top gainers on the Nifty Midcap 150 at 10:30 am on Thursday.

items.title: GAIL India shares rise 2.07% in morning trade
items.description: Moneycontrol analysis indicated a bearish sentiment on the stock as of September 4, 2025.

items.title: Bharat Heavy Electricals shares rise 2.17%; stock among top gainers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 224.80, Bharat Heavy Electricals has shown a positive movement in today's session.

items.title: Eternal-Zomato shares rise 2.08% in morning trade
items.description: With Eternal shares currently trading at Rs 331.15, the stock has shown a positive move in today's session.

items.title: Hindustan Zinc shares rise 2.08% in morning trade
items.description: A Moneycontrol analysis, as of September 5, 2025, indicates a very bullish sentiment on the stock.
